attributes.review: this app took 2 weeks to download and when i tried to open it flashed orange and took me to a different website. the website it took me to said it was going to detonate my phone if i didnt open the link that was on the website in 10 seconds, so obviously i opened the link. the link then took me to a place that said they were sending ninja fish to my house, 40 seconds later there were ninja fish breaking through all of my windows in my house and they started to take my family and swallow them whole, along with my pet duck, girard. the fish said that if i didnt get them a tesla model x within 30 seconds they would explode my house. and when i told them i couldnt by golly they blew my house up with my in it. i only survived because i was right by one of the ninja fish that took the blow of the explosion. they all regurgitated by family and even girard the duck. i am now homeless and need 30 years of therapy due to this issue. that is why im giving it a one star review.
attributes.title: he ate my duck

attributes.review: I let my grandma borrow my phone for the day and she opened this app to see what it was. She was IMMEDIATELY  bombarded with an image of the most vile and disgusting fake tanned orange Cheeto dusted man on the planet. The doctors told me that the terror she felt sent her into cardiac arrest and triggered a brain aneurysm which thankfully made her bleed from her eyes making her blind. She died minutes later but her blindness make it so she didnâ€™t have to see that disgusting face while she died. I am heartbroken and will be deleting this app promptly. I hope nobody has to go through the pain my family and I went through at the result of this app. Please prey for us and did this app to be taken down.
attributes.title: Killed my grandma
